name: listBidcosInterfaces
shortDescription: This method only exists for compatibility reasons.
description: This method only exists for backward compatibility with the CCU and has no real function.
returnValue:
Returns an array with one element. This element is a struct with four fields:
  • ADDRESS (String): The serial number of your central device
  • DESCRIPTION (String): Always:

• CONNECTED (Boolean): State of the RF device. When false RF device is not working.
  • DEFAULT (Boolean): Always true
